title: Our Roles
text: 2IA engineers can take on a variety of roles, from data scientists and machine learning engineers to data engineers, AI researchers, project managers, and R&D engineers. Their flexibility and expertise make them valuable assets in the tech industry's diverse landscape.

section.title: Data Engineer
section.content: Ant Design is a React UI library that has a lot of easy-to-use components for building elegant UI.
